item.title: The global conference of the OpenStreetMap community, State of the Map (SotM), will be making its way to Nairobi, Kenya from September 6th-8th 2024! <https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/08/14/announcing-state-of-the-map-2024-september-6-to-8-2024-join-us-in-nairobi-and-online/> #OSM #gischat #OpenStreetMap #StateOfTheMap #SotM #sotm2024
Remember you can be https://Supporting.OpenStreetMap.org! Screenshot of the OpenStreetMap Mastodon account profile showing the verificated supporting.osm.org link

OSM is 19 years old: we‚Äôre launching an online fundraising campaign to support its future Blog Post: https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/08/09/happy-birthday-openstreetmap-2/ Support here: https://supporting.openstreetmap.org/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat
It's OpenStreetMap's Birthday today! üéÇü•≥ #HappyBirthdayOSM #OpenStreetMap #OSM #gischat Graphic with the OSM logo in the middle and various benefits of OSM
Happy 19th Birthday, OpenStreetMap! #OpenStreetMap It's time to celebrate
Do you want to get started mapping into #OpenStreetMap? ü§î Here's some guides! üôÇ https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Beginners%27_guide https://learnosm.org/

#OpenStreetMap will be 19 years old in Aug! üòçüéÇ Are you hosting an OSM Birthday Party? Add it to the list <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/OpenStreetMap_19th_Anniversary_Birthday_party> #OSM #OSM19 #OpenStreetMap19

OpenStreetMap is for creating maps that anyone can use. When filmmakers, on the set of Hollywood blockbusters, need a map, they turn to us! Here's where you can see OSM being used in movies: <https://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Films> Anything missing? Add it to the wiki page! üôÇ #OpenStreetMap #OSM

One of the best ways to financially support OpenStreetMap is to donate to the OpenStreetMap Foundation! Once off, or recurring, donations are always welcome. Don't forget to mention the fediverse/mastodon in the donation message. üôÇ https://donate.openstreetmap.org/ #OSM #OpenStreetMap #OSMF #OSMFoundation
Happy #NonBinaryDay to everyone in #OpenStreetMap! üè≥Ô∏è‚Äçüåàüè≥Ô∏è‚Äç‚ößÔ∏è‚ößÔ∏è‚òÑÔ∏è #NonBinaryAwarenessWeek #OSM The OpenStreetMap logo, but the colours are the nonbinary pride flag.

One of the largest SotMs (300-400 attendees) this year will be #SotMEU (@sotmeu) in Antwerp, Belgium on November 10-11. If your company is using #OSM data or is #geospatial #gis or #mapmaking, you should come and sponsor! The sponsorship prospectus is here: https://stateofthemap.eu/pdf/SotmEU_Sponsorship_Packet.pdf #gischat #OpenStreetMap
Why State of the Map conferences are important https://blog.openstreetmap.org/2023/07/07/why-state-of-the-map-conferences-are-so-important-to-osm/ #OpenStreetMap #OSM #StateOfTheMap #SotM

‚ÄúWe are aware of the Maxar imagery unavailability issue and have been in regular contact with them about key rotation and other security mitigation efforts. We have not heard much, but are trying to resolve.‚Äù @grischard (OSMF Chair) #OpenStreetMap #OSM #Maxar #OSMF

Additional Information about the Maxar Imagery issue can be found in the OSM community forum https://community.openstreetmap.org/t/maxar-imagery-not-working-was-maxar-is-blurred-in-id-and-other-similar-topics/100524/19 #OpenStreetMap #OSM #Maxar
Posts on this page ( https://osm.town/@openstreetmap ) will always be visible without needing an account on this website. We value openness in #OpenStreetMap. üôÇ
4. (cont.) We are looking for social media ambassadors for OSMF fundraising. Join us to support the future of #OpenStreetMap! ‚ô•Ô∏è (send an email to fundraising@osmfoundation.org )

4. Fundraising: The OSMF's fundraising goal for 2023 is 521,000 GBP. OSM is free to use, but not free to make--contributions from all who use #openstreetmap are needed to support its stability and quality. https://donate.openstreetmap.org
3. (cont). Improving OSMF infrastructure and use of OSM data through community development and grants, and conducting feasibility on an ED role for the OSMF to support strategy.
3. Plans for strategic growth include: adding a sys/admin and project management; standing up vector tile infrastructure . . . and:
2. The Strategic Plan will be communicated as general goals, rather than detailed tactics
